verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%> Oh give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is good; <S%H2896><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> can speak <S%H4448><s%> of the mighty <S%H1369><s%> deeds <S%H1369><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Or can show <S%H8085><s%> forth all <S%H3605><s%> His praise <S%H8416><s%>?
How blessed <S%H835><s%> are those who keep <S%H8104><s%> justice, <S%H4941><s%> Who practice <S%H6213><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> times! <S%H6256><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> me, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> in [Thy] favor <S%H7522><s%> toward Thy people; <S%H5971><s%> Visit <S%H6485><s%> me with Thy salvation, <S%H3444><s%>

That I may see <S%H7200><s%> the prosperity <S%H9186><s%> of Thy chosen <S%H972><s%> ones, <S%H972><s%> That I may rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in the gladness <S%H8057><s%> of Thy nation, <S%H1471><s%> That I may glory <S%H1984><s%> with Thine inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> like <S%H5973><s%> our fathers, We have committed <S%H1><s%> iniquity, <S%H5753><s%> we have behaved <S%H5753><s%> wickedly. <S%H7561><s%>

Our fathers in Egypt <S%H1><s%> did not understand <S%H4714><s%> Thy wonders; <S%H7919><s%> They did not remember <S%H6381><s%> Thine abundant <S%H2142><s%> kindnesses, <S%H7230><s%> But rebelled <S%H2617><s%> by the sea, <S%H4784><s%> at the Red <S%H3220><s%> <S%H5488><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>
Nevertheless He saved <S%H3467><s%> them for the sake <S%H4616><s%> of His name, <S%H8034><s%> That He might make <S%H3045><s%> His power <S%H1369><s%> known. <S%H3045><s%>

Thus He rebuked <S%H1605><s%> the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> and it dried <S%H9162><s%> up; And He led <S%H1980><s%> them through the deeps, <S%H8415><s%> as through the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>
So He saved <S%H3467><s%> them from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the one who hated <S%H8130><s%> [them,] And redeemed <S%H1350><s%> them from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy. <S%H340><s%>
And the waters <S%H4325><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> their adversaries; <S%H6862><s%> Not one <S%H259><s%> of them was left. <S%H3498><s%>
Then they believed <S%H539><s%> His words; <S%H1697><s%> They sang <S%H7891><s%> His praise. <S%H8416><s%>
They quickly <S%H4116><s%> forgot <S%H7911><s%> His works; <S%H4639><s%> They did not wait <S%H2442><s%> for His counsel, <S%H6098><s%>
But craved <S%H183><s%> intensely <S%H8378><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> And tempted <S%H5254><s%> God <S%H410><s%> in the desert. <S%H3452><s%>
So He gave <S%H5414><s%> them their request, <S%H7596><s%> But sent <S%H7971><s%> a wasting <S%H7332><s%> disease <S%H7332><s%> among them.
When they became <S%H7065><s%> envious <S%H7065><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> And of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> the holy <S%H6918><s%> one <S%H6918><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%>
The earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> and swallowed <S%H1104><s%> up Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> And engulfed <S%H3680><s%> the company <S%H5712><s%> of Abiram. <S%H48><s%>
And a fire <S%H784><s%> blazed <S%H1197><s%> up in their company; <S%H5712><s%> The flame <S%H3852><s%> consumed <S%H3857><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
They made <S%H6213><s%> a calf <S%H5695><s%> in Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> And worshiped <S%H7812><s%> a molten <S%H4541><s%> image. <S%H4541><s%>
Thus they exchanged <S%H4171><s%> their glory <S%H9202><s%> For the image <S%H8403><s%> of an ox <S%H7794><s%> that eats <S%H398><s%> grass. <S%H6212><s%>
They forgot <S%H7911><s%> God <S%H410><s%> their Savior, <S%H3467><s%> Who had done <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> things <S%H1419><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>
Wonders <S%H6381><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham, <S%H2526><s%> [And] awesome <S%H3372><s%> things by the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Therefore He said <S%H559><s%> that He would destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, Had not Moses <S%H4872><s%> His chosen <S%H972><s%> one stood <S%H5975><s%> in the breach <S%H6556><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him, To turn <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> His wrath <S%H2534><s%> from destroying <S%H7843><s%> [them.]
Then they despised <S%H3988><s%> the pleasant <S%H2532><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> They did not believe <S%H539><s%> in His word, <S%H1697><s%>
But grumbled <S%H7279><s%> in their tents; <S%H168><s%> They did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
Therefore He swore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them, That He would cast <S%H5307><s%> them down <S%H5307><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%>
And that He would cast <S%H5307><s%> their seed <S%H2233><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> And scatter <S%H2219><s%> them in the lands. <S%H776><s%>
They joined <S%H6775><s%> themselves also to Baal-peor, And ate <S%H398><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> offered to the dead. <S%H4191><s%>
Thus they provoked <S%H3707><s%> [Him] to anger <S%H3707><s%> with their deeds; <S%H4611><s%> And the plague <S%H4046><s%> broke <S%H6555><s%> out among them.
Then Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> up and interposed; <S%H6419><s%> And so the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed. <S%H6113><s%>
And it was reckoned <S%H2803><s%> to him for righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> To all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

They also provoked <S%H7107><s%> [Him] to wrath <S%H7107><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah, <S%H4809><s%> So that it went <S%H7489><s%> hard <S%H7489><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> on their account; <S%H5668><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> they were rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H854><s%> His Spirit, <S%H7307><s%> He spoke <S%H981><s%> rashly <S%H981><s%> with his lips. <S%H8193><s%>
They did not destroy <S%H8045><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> As the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H559><s%> them,
But they mingled <S%H6148><s%> with the nations, <S%H1471><s%> And learned <S%H3925><s%> their practices, <S%H4639><s%>
And served <S%H5647><s%> their idols, <S%H6091><s%> Which became <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H4170><s%> to them.
They even sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> to the demons, <S%H7700><s%>

And shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H9345><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> The blood <S%H1818><s%> of their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters, <S%H1323><s%> Whom <S%H834><s%> they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> to the idols <S%H6091><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> And the land <S%H776><s%> was polluted <S%H2610><s%> with the blood. <S%H1818><s%>
Thus they became <S%H2930><s%> unclean <S%H2930><s%> in their practices, <S%H4639><s%> And played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> in their deeds. <S%H4611><s%>
Therefore the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against His people, <S%H5971><s%> And He abhorred <S%H8581><s%> His inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
Then He gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the nations; <S%H1471><s%> And those <S%H1992><s%> who hated <S%H8130><s%> them ruled <S%H4910><s%> over them.
Their enemies <S%H340><s%> also oppressed <S%H3905><s%> them, And they were subdued <S%H3665><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> their power. <S%H3027><s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> He would deliver <S%H5337><s%> them; They, however, were rebellious <S%H4784><s%> in their counsel, <S%H6098><s%> And [so] sank <S%H4355><s%> down <S%H4355><s%> in their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
Nevertheless He looked <S%H7200><s%> upon their distress, <S%H9496><s%> When He heard <S%H8085><s%> their cry; <S%H7440><s%>
And He remembered <S%H2142><s%> His covenant <S%H1285><s%> for their sake, And relented <S%H5162><s%> according to the greatness <S%H7230><s%> of His lovingkindness. <S%H2617><s%>
He also made <S%H5414><s%> them [objects] of compassion <S%H7356><s%> In the presence <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their captors. <S%H7617><s%>

Save <S%H3467><s%> us, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> And gather <S%H6908><s%> us from among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> To give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> And glory <S%H9576><s%> in Thy praise. <S%H8416><s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> From everlasting <S%H5769><s%> even to everlasting. <S%H5769><s%> And let all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Amen. <S%H543><s%>" Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
